  • Uses of Action in dev.webfx.stack.ui.action.impl

    Classes in dev.webfx.stack.ui.action.impl that implement Action
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    ActionGroupImpl
     
    class 
    ReadOnlyAction
    A read-only action where properties are observable values.
    final class 
    SeparatorAction
     
    class 
    WritableAction
    An writable action where properties (text, graphic, disabled, visible) can be set later (ie after constructor call) either by calling the setters or by binding these properties (ex: writableTextProperty().bind(myTextProperty))
